create_entry.default: Your Strava Home Assistant Integration has been successfully installed

abort.already_configured: A Strava Home Assistant Integration has already been installed. You can only have one installation at a time
abort.no_public_url: Your Home Assistant Instance does not seem to have a public URL. The Strava Home Assistant integration requires a public URL

abort.no_config: Could not find the Strava Home Assistant configuration
abort.update_success: The Strava Home Assistant configuration was updated successfully!
